skins.selfIntroduction: It is I. I, Jamaica, who sabotaged Iron Blood's operation in the Barents Sea; I, who sealed Scharnhorst to her fate: to sink in the Battle of the North Cape. Operation Tungsten? Of course I was there. As was I during the subsequent civil war... As long as Evil continues its march, I will keep fighting... Yes, all my choices were made by Justice itself...
skins.acquisition: Ugh... my eye is throbbing again... So you're the Boss, huh? The name's Jamaica. All is in the name of Justice...
skins.login: Boss, my Eye has seen it... Your necktie is slightly loose.
skins.details: Boss, can you check if these chains are covering my left eye? I'll reposition my arm.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Boss, is the "you" that my Eye sees really "you"?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Boss, care to race with me? I will show you what real Lighting looks like.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I feel it. Somewhere in the world, the darkness of night is enveloping something...
skins.secretaryTouch: ...Boss, keep your hands to yourself. Otherwise you'll startle me when I'm concentrating.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...Boss, t-this isn't the place for this...

skins.shipDescription: Hey Boss, you talkin' about my sweet bike? Heh, I made it myself by scrounging up parts from Akashi's place. Pretty cool, huh?
skins.acquisition: Hey Boss, you talkin' about my sweet bike? Heh, I made it myself by scrounging up parts from Akashi's place. Pretty cool, huh?
skins.login: Boss, the weather be fine today. Wanna go for a ride?
skins.details: Boss, if you have time, wanna help me upgrade my bike? I got some sick ideas.
skins.secretaryIdle1: When somethin' is on my mind, I just keep on riding until my troubles are left far, far behind... However, it's really easy to get lost.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Boss, when I drive, I like to go fast. When you're sitting behind me, make sure to hold on tight!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Boss, what if I named this bad boy here "Dark Bolt?"
skins.secretaryTouch: Boss, do you wanna try riding too? Be careful, this guy's got some serious horsepower.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Boss... even though I told you to hold on to me tight, I didn't mean right there...

skins.shipDescription: Look, Boss, this is the new bike that Akashi sent me. She said she wanted me to be her brand ambassador... Doesn't that job sound badass?
skins.acquisition: Look, Boss, this is the new bike that Akashi sent me. She said she wanted me to be her brand ambassador... Doesn't that job sound badass?
skins.details: Akashi said she'd give me this bike in exchange for some "marketing." Sooo... Boss, what do you think? Wanna buy one?
skins.secretaryIdle1: This baby's got more horsepower than the other one, even if it's less reliable. She's still a good bike.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Worried about your hair? Well, safety's the most important thing on the road, so you'd better hang on to this helmet.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Boss, would you like to learn about motorcycles? I thought you might. Let's begin with starting the engine. First...
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you hear it, boss? The rumbling of her engine? She thirsts for the open road. What are you waiting for? Hop on! But don't forget your helmet.
